summary: TAKATA RECALL RECEIVED A LETTER APRIL 2016, HEARING NOW THEY ARE NOT FIXING THIS ISSUE, WHILE 16 PEOPLE HAVE BEEN KILLED OR 180 INJURED - DUE TO EXPLODING WITH SO MUCH FORCE AND SPEW SHRAPNEL INTO DRIVER AND PASSENGERS, IT'S LIKE DRIVING A SUICIDE CAR EVERY DAY, SCARY!  I'M A WIDOW, ON A FIXED INCOME AFRAID TO DRIVE MY CAR, WHICH IS ALL I RELY ON NOW TO GET AROUND.
